We are a group of mathematicians, statisticians, computer scientists, geographers, and infectious disease experts who are analysing data about COVID-19 in Ireland. We are based in the [Hamilton Institute](https://www.maynoothuniversity.ie/hamilton) at [Maynooth University](https://www.maynoothuniversity.ie).

What would you like to do?

  - See the latest figures from our [dashboard](dashboard.html)
  - Read some [blog posts](posts.html) about COVID-19 in Ireland
  - Play with [some apps](apps.html)
  - Find out more about [the team and the project](about.html)

We are very grateful to [Science Foundation Ireland](https://www.sfi.ie) for providing us with funding for this project via their emergency COVID-19 funding portal via grant number 20/COV/0081.
